Original: 最近開始學抽雪茄，搜尋了一下附近的雪茄館，才發現我家旁邊的這家神奇的店家原來是一家雪茄館！門面開始看起來以為是在賣保險箱的商家，想說怎麼弄得那麼有氛圍的感覺像是夜店，開了幾年後終於進去了解一下，原來裡面另有洞天，高級傢具搭配上精緻的裝修設計，主要營業項目則是咖啡館加上雪茄館，並提供了紅酒及威士忌搭配雪茄，非常適合好友在用餐後來此放鬆聊天，尤其現在想抽菸的人都不是很受歡迎，不想弄到家裡都是菸味，絕對可以選擇來這品雪茄，今天帶朋友一起過來品完雪茄搭配威士忌後就決定趕緊挑一些古巴雪茄加入會員，每位會員都會有個專屬於自己的雪茄櫃，控制在恆溫恆濕的環境裡也不需要擔心會變質長蟲的問題啦！
EN: Recently, I started to learn to pump cigars. After searching for the nearby cigar, I found that the magical shop next to my house was originally a cigar shop!The facade starts to think that it is a merchant selling safe. I want to say how to make it like a nightclub. After a few years of opening, I finally went in to find out. It turned out that there were other caves and high -end furniture. The main business items are cafes and cigar pavilions, and provide red wine and whiskey with cigars. It is very suitable for friends to relax and chat after meals. Especially now people who want to smoke are not very popular. They don’t want to get home at home. The smell of smoke, you can definitely choose to come to this cigar. Today, take friends to taste the cigars with cigars and whiskey, and decide to quickly pick some Cuban cigars to join the members. Each member will have a cigar cabinet that is exclusive to it. There is no need to worry about the problem of deterioration and long bugs in the environment!

Original:
Amazing Wonderland 😍😍😍 今晚去 #法頌珠寶 拿上周訂作耶穌送我的戒指 回家路上經過這家店 門口是賣精品保險櫃 但有賣調酒的招牌酒單 還有干貝水餃 就進來看看 沒想到一入場驚為天人：音樂+內裝+酒+包廂環境 幾乎是飯店等級的酒吧欸😍

也是第一次進來這種所謂的雪茄酒館 真的超有fu 酒單設計是 #老電影系列調酒 完全就是我的菜啊😍 干貝水餃的皮是用海藻素做的 吃起來是滿滿的海洋味道❤

第一杯我點 La Vie En Rose #玫瑰人生 雖然沒看過電影 但喝起來是完全的玫瑰花香清雅淡麗 就是法式鄉村年輕女孩的浪漫氛圍 超級喜歡😍

第二杯是 A flower in the haze #似花還似非花 茉莉花香跟藥草酒 稍重的酒體 喝起來根本是香水酒🤣 畫面是淡黃色 擦潘海利根香水的lady 喝茉莉花下午茶的恬靜感❤

店長是山東的型男紳士 bartender 是美術系出身 老闆是留法的小提琴音樂家 根本就是超適合藝術人的酒吧阿🤣 有不定期音樂live活動 還有場地租借拍戲 有需求的同好真的可以認真參考這一家😎
#耶穌的新婦 #耶穌完全知道我的喜好 #直接給我最好的品味等級的約會🤩
EN:
Amazing Wonderland 😍😍😍 Tonight to go to#a a Jewelry to get the ring that Jesus sent to me last week and go home on the way to pass the shop door is a boutique safe, but there is a signature wine list that sells alcohol, and shellfish dumplings come in I didn't expect to be shocked as a heavenly man when I entered the venue: Music+interior+wine+box environment is almost a hotel -level bar

It is also the first time that this so -called cigar tavern really has a FU wine list design. Taste ❤

In the first cup, I ordered LA VIE EN ROSE #第一 第一 第一 第一 Although I haven't watched a movie, it is a complete rose fragrance, elegant and elegant, and the romantic atmosphere of French village young girls.

The second cup is a Flower in the haze #like flowers and the heavier wine body that is non -flower jasmine and herbs is simply a perfume wine.

The store manager is Shandong's male gentleman Bartender is the violin musician of the art department. Reference to this family
# #Jesus knows my preferences #🤩 🤩

Original:
因朋友介紹而來，燈光美、氣氛佳，設計感十足，店內整體質感是一般店家所看不到的。
其甜點是小老闆精心挑選的法式甜點，在用料、製作上的細膩程度讓人驚嘆!大推!
咖啡跟調酒更是讓人大開眼界，從豆子的挑選到新穎的雞尾酒作品，都能看出小老闆的挑剔跟品味!
上至小老闆、經理，下至服務人員，親切、有相當知識水準的服務讓不懂雪茄的朋友也能安心的了解雪茄的世界，小啜幾口，再配上獨特的咖啡、調酒，實為人間享受..

如果有幸遇到帥氣的小老闆，可以與其暢談、閒聊，絕對不虛此行!

From the introduction of friends, the lights are beautiful, the atmosphere is good, and the design sense is full. The overall texture in the store cannot be seen by ordinary shops.
Its dessert is the French dessert carefully selected by the little boss.
Coffee and bartending are even more eye -opening. From the selection of beans to the novel cocktail works, we can see that the little boss's picky and taste!
From the little boss, manager, and the service staff, the kind and considerable level of knowledge allows friends who do not understand cigars to understand the world of cigars with peace of mind. Really enjoyment for the world ...

If you are lucky enough to meet the handsome little boss, you can talk to him and chat with him.
